headline.main: American Diet: Better Than We Think?

docs.abstract: Int with Dr D Mark Hegsted, Agr Dept Human Nutrition Center dir, on Amer diet; Hegsted says Amers are over-concerned about diet; por (L)
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON Despite all the criticism of the American diet. Dr. D. Mark Hegsted, director of the Government's new Human Nutrition Center, thinks we are eating better than most of us have been led to believe.
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON Despite all the criticism of the  American diet. Dr. D. Mark Hegsted, director of the Government's new Human Nutrition Center, thinks we are eating better than most of us have been led to believe.
